text: Idolagnostus is a genus of trilobite in the order Agnostida, which existed in what is now Queensland, Australia. It was described by Öpik in 1967, and the type species is Idolagnostus agrestis.Available Generic Names for Trilobites P.A. Jell and J.M. Adrain. ==References== Category:Agnostidae Category:Agnostida genera Category:Trilobites of Australia
title: Idolagnostus
